node.html:
Mauricio Mercado

title: ‘About me’ layout: page path: ‘/about’

Hi 👋, I’m Mauricio Mercado, I’m originally from Barranquilla, Colombia 🇨🇴, I currently reside in beautiful Vancouver, BC. Canada 🇨🇦!,

I’ve been software engineer for almost 9+ years now, I started with Python and Python/Django, then Ruby and Ruby on Rails, and lastly Javascript, specifically React and NodeJS. I love new challenges, and always striving to learn new things! Lately I have being learning Go, Typescript, Terraform and CI/CD with GCP and CircleCI, also and always improving my functional programming chops.

I have a Master’s Degree in Computer Science from La Universidad de los Andes

You can see my professional experience in more detail here.

About hobbies and other interests, well, I used to be a kite boarding certified assistant back when I was living in Barranquilla 🇨🇴, I still kite board here in Vancouver, but I mostly spend the weekends either biking, hiking, paddling boarding, or simply enjoying 🍻 with friends, during patio season! During the winter however is time to snowboard 🏂.

Everyone once in a while I like to take my camera off and take some pictures, and of course traveling, that’s a given tho’ it’s rare to find someone who does not like to go traveling 🛫, of course, for pleasure!

This blog is my attempt at giving back to the community by creating value through my learnings, and experiences, and by doing so I hopefully help someone, or at the very least help my future self, by encountering solutions that I have written about in the past. And lastly I found a lot of inspiration/courage by following and reading the writings of Kent C. Dodds and Shawn Wang specifically Learn in Public and Getting Noticed and Widening Your Reach.

Feel free to contact/follow me on twitter, GitHub, stack overflow or instagram

Thank you for reading my resume. If you want to contact me, Please send me an email.
